mapper.select: select id, parentid as pid, resources_name as `name` from system_resources
mapper.insert: insert into system_role(role_name, `status`, remark, createtime) values (#{roleName}, #{status}, #{remark}, now());
mapper.select: SELECT tsr.role_name, tsr.remark, tsr.status, tsyp.id AS resourcesid, tsyp.resources_name, tsyp.resources, tsyp.`resources_code`, tsyc.id AS resourcesid1, tsyc.resources_name AS resources_name1, tsyc.resources AS resources1, tsyc.`resources_code` AS resources_code1 FROM system_role tsr JOIN system_role_resources tsrr ON tsr.id = tsrr.roleid LEFT JOIN system_resources tsyp ON tsrr.resourcesid = tsyp.id LEFT JOIN system_resources tsyc ON tsyp.id = tsyc.parentid WHERE tsr.id = #{roleid} AND tsyp.status = 'ENABLE' AND tsyc.status = 'ENABLE' AND tsyp.type = 'MENU' AND (tsyp.parentid IS NULL OR tsyp.parentid = 0) ORDER BY tsyp.sort, tsyc.sort;

select tu.id, tu.`user_name`,tu.`password` ,tu.real_name,tu.mobile, tu.status,tu.createtime,tu.updatetime,tu.last_logintime,tr.id,tr.role_name from system_user tu left join system_user_role tur on tu.id = tur.userid left join system_role tr on tur.roleid = tr.id where 1=1
and tu.user_name like concat("%",#{username},"%")
and tu.real_name like concat("%",#{realname},"%")
and tu.mobile like concat("%",#{mobile},"%")
and tur.roleid = #{role}
order by createtime desc
limit ${offset},${limit}
